name: .CDMZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .CDMZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CDMZ file is a mind-mapping document created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw MINDMAP, a program that captures ideas with mind maps. It contains a diagram comprised of text, connecting relationship lines, objects, images, shapes, and symbols. ConceptDraw MINDMAP users create CDMZ files to save various types of mind maps, such as brainstorming sessions and flowcharts.

content: ConceptDraw MINDMAP is a mind-mapping tool for helping you organize and visualize ideas and plans. The app is included with the ConceptDraw OFFICE suite, which also comes with ConceptDraw PROJECT and ConceptDraw DIAGRAM.
CS Odessa replaced .CDMM files with CDMZ files. Also, ConceptDraw PROJECT allows you to save documents as .CDMTZ templates.

instructions: You can open CDMZ files with CS Odessa ConceptDraw MINDMAP in Windows and macOS. To open a CDMZ file, select File â†’ Open.
